DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the short-term mean 24-hour intraocular pressure control, 24-hour blood pressure effect and safety of Latanoprost/Timolol fixed combination given once in the evening with placebo once in the morning versus timolol maleate 0.5% given twice daily in patients with ocular hypertension and primary open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: 24-Hour Intraocular Pressure (IOP) And Blood Pressure Control In Glaucoma And Ocular Hypertension Patients
DOC.criteria: POAG OHT Advanced glaucoma Arterial Hypertension
